findings.title: HTTP Request Without Timeout
findings.description: HTTP request without timeout - can cause indefinite hang
findings.code_snippet:
17 | def test_timeout():
      18 |     # VULN: No timeout - can hang indefinitely
>>>   19 |     response = requests.get("https://api.example.com/data")
      20 | 
      21 |     # VULN: Explicit None timeout
findings.recommendation: Always specify timeout parameter to prevent indefinite hangs. Use timeout=30 or similar.

findings.title: TOCTOU Race Condition
findings.description: TOCTOU risk - exists() check before operation
findings.code_snippet:
70 | def test_race_condition(filename):
      71 |     # VULN: Check-then-use pattern
>>>   72 |     if os.path.exists(filename):
      73 |         with open(filename, 'r') as f:
      74 |             data = f.read()
findings.recommendation: Use atomic file operations. Open files directly without prior existence checks.

findings.title: TOCTOU Race Condition
findings.description: TOCTOU risk - os.access() check (use open() instead)
findings.code_snippet:
75 | 
      76 |     # VULN: access() before open()
>>>   77 |     if os.access(filename, os.R_OK):
      78 |         f = open(filename, 'r')
      79 |
findings.recommendation: Use atomic file operations. Open files directly without prior existence checks.
